name: ts-promisify-event-emitter
description: Another implementation of Event Emitter but strongly typed, 'promisified' and configurable maxListeners

scripts.build: rm -rf ./bin || mkdir bin && tsc --downlevelIteration --lib dom,es6 *.ts --outDir ./bin && cp ./main.d.ts ./bin/

author: Alvaro Bernal Gimeno
